comment: * Implementation of {@link SchemaFactory#newInstance(String)}. * * @author Kohsuke Kawaguchi * @version $Revision: 727367 $, $Date: 2008-12-17 05:05:26 -0800 (Wed, 17 Dec 2008) $ * @since 1.5

methods.name: public SchemaFactory newFactory(String schemaLanguage)
methods.comment:
*

Creates a new {@link SchemaFactory} object for the specified * schema language.

* * @param schemaLanguage * See {@link SchemaFactory Schema Language} table in SchemaFactory * for the list of available schema languages. * * @return null if the callee fails to create one. * * @throws NullPointerException * If the schemaLanguage parameter is null.

methods.name: private SchemaFactory _newFactory(String schemaLanguage)
methods.comment:
*

Lookup a SchemaFactory for the given schemaLanguage.

* * @param schemaLanguage Schema language to lookup SchemaFactory for. * * @return SchemaFactory for the given schemaLanguage.

methods.name: SchemaFactory createInstance(String className)
methods.comment:
*

Creates an instance of the specified and returns it.

* * @param className * fully qualified class name to be instantiated. * * @return null * if it fails. Error messages will be printed by this method.

methods.name: private Iterable<URL> createServiceFileIterator()
methods.comment:
* Returns an {@link Iterator} that enumerates all
     * the META-INF/services files that we care.

methods.name: private SchemaFactory loadFromServicesFile(String schemaLanguage, String resourceName, InputStream in)
methods.comment: Searches for a SchemaFactory for a given schema language in a META-INF/services file.

methods.name: private static String which(String classname, ClassLoader loader)
methods.comment:
*

Search the specified classloader for the given classname.

* * @param classname the fully qualified name of the class to search for * @param loader the classloader to search * * @return the source location of the resource, or null if it wasn't found

methodNames: private SchemaFactory loadFromServicesFile(String schemaLanguage, String resourceName, InputStream in)
private static String which(String classname, ClassLoader loader)
